metadata.title: CVE-2023-52918 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: pci: cx23885: check cx23885_vdev_init() returncx23885_vdev_init() can return a NULL pointer, but that pointeris used in the next line without a check.Add a NULL pointer check and go to the error unwind if it is NULL.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
